CustomField.description: ************** Remember to update Business Unit NO Snapshot formula field on Opportunity when new picklist values are added! **************************
CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE((IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit_SE__c , "BVS" ), "BVS;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit__c , "APPS" ), "APPS;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit__c , "Advisory" ), "Advisory;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit__c , "DPS" ), "DPS;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit__c , "Biometrics" ), "Biometrics;",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Business_Unit__c , "BD" ), "BD;",null ) & "#"), ";#",""),"#","-")
CustomField.label: Business Unit NO Snapshot
